Restaurants

  • Biscotte Restaurant

    Best place in the world

    Welcome to Biscotte restaurant! Restaurant Biscotte offers a cuisine based on fresh, quality products, often local, organic when possible, and always produced by passionate producers.

  • Mystic Olive Bistro

    Nestled in the heart of the city, Mystic Olive Bistro offers a culinary journey that transcends the ordinary. Drawing inspiration from Mediterranean coasts, our dishes celebrate the fusion of traditional flavors with a modern twist. Every plate tells a story of heritage, passion, and creativity, crafted meticulously by our seasoned chefs. Indulge in our curated wine selection, sourced from the world's finest vineyards, to complement your meal. At Mystic Olive Bistro, we invite you to partake in an exquisite dining experience where every moment is seasoned with love and enchantment.
